full_summary:
# Government Tender for Beaver Creek Institution Perimeter Lights Replacement - Phase 1

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: WS3712987383-Doc3712987434
* Solicitation Number: WS3712987383
* Publication Date: 2022-10-19
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-03T14:00:00 (Note: Amendment to Closing Time - All bids must be submitted by 2022-11-03T14:00:00 to be considered)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2022-12-05
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-04-05

## Tender Notice

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the Beaver Creek Institution Perimeter Lights Replacement - Phase 1. The tender is a competitive open bidding process with the lowest price as the selection criterion.

The end user is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

## Procurement Details

* Category: CNST
* Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR)

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

## Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact Michael Macukic at michael.macukic@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Tender Documents

Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the following link for complete details: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14410736?extsite=MTQ0MTA3MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: Please disregard any discrepancies in formatting or minor errors in the contractor's original text. ~Heorius Telegrams
## Notes

* The tender has expired and is no longer active.
* The tender description has been edited to clarify the amendment to the closing time.
* All contact information has been verified and confirmed.
* The notice URL has been verified
